<uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[customStyle]]" FieldValue="{}{{
 var cH = "[[customH]]";
 var cW = "[[customW]]";

 if(cH.length > 1 ||cW.length > 1){
 var result = 'style="'+cH+ cW+'"';
 }else{
 var result = "";
 }

}}" IndexNumber="1" /> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="" FieldValue="" IndexNumber="2" /> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity> </FlowStep> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </FlowDecision.True> <FlowDecision.False> <FlowStep x:Name="__ReferenceID6"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <av:Point x:Key="ShapeLocation">412,676</av:Point> <av:Size x:Key="ShapeSize">256,88</av:Size> <av:PointCollection x:Key="ConnectorLocation">540,764 540,873 476,873</av:PointCollection> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity CurrentResult="{x:Null}" ExplicitDataList="{x:Null}" InputMapping="{x:Null}" InputTransformation="{x:Null}" OnResumeKeepList="{x:Null}" OutputMapping="{x:Null}" ParentServiceName="{x:Null}" ParentWorkflowInstanceId="{x:Null}" ResultTransformation="{x:Null}" ServiceHost="{x:Null}" SimulationOutput="{x:Null}" Add="False" AmbientDataList="[AmbientDataList]" CreateBookmark="False" DatabindRecursive="False" DisplayName="Assign(1)" HasError="[HasError]" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="256,88" InstructionList="[InstructionList]" IsSimulationEnabled="False" IsUIStep="False" IsValid="[IsValid]" IsWorkflow="False" OnResumeClearAmbientDataList="False" OnResumeClearTags="FormView,InstanceId,Bookmark,ParentWorkflowInstanceId,ParentServiceName,WebPage" UpdateAllOccurrences="False"> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[customW]]" FieldValue="{}{{

 }
 var result = "width:"+w+";";
}}" IndexNumber="1" /> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="" FieldValue="" IndexNumber="2" /> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity> <FlowStep.Next> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID0</x:Reference> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </FlowDecision.False> </FlowDecision> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </FlowDecision.True> <FlowDecision.False> <FlowStep x:Name="__ReferenceID3"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <av:Point x:Key="ShapeLocation">412,326</av:Point> <av:Size x:Key="ShapeSize">256,88</av:Size> <av:PointCollection x:Key="ConnectorLocation">540,414 540,444 325,444 325,542.5</av:PointCollection> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity CurrentResult="{x:Null}" ExplicitDataList="{x:Null}" InputMapping="{x:Null}" InputTransformation="{x:Null}" OnResumeKeepList="{x:Null}" OutputMapping="{x:Null}" ParentServiceName="{x:Null}" ParentWorkflowInstanceId="{x:Null}" ResultTransformation="{x:Null}" ServiceHost="{x:Null}" SimulationOutput="{x:Null}" Add="False" AmbientDataList="[AmbientDataList]" CreateBookmark="False" DatabindRecursive="False" DisplayName="Assign(1)" HasError="[HasError]" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="256,88" InstructionList="[InstructionList]" IsSimulationEnabled="False" IsUIStep="False" IsValid="[IsValid]" IsWorkflow="False" OnResumeClearAmbientDataList="False" OnResumeClearTags="FormView,InstanceId,Bookmark,ParentWorkflowInstanceId,ParentServiceName,WebPage" UpdateAllOccurrences="False"> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[customH]]" FieldValue="{}{{
